welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Aldenham, known for its picturesque countryside and rich history. We hope you'll enjoy exploring our quaint city and all it has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northolt Airport caters to VIP and private aircraft.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 at Luton Airport is used for budget airlines and low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, with free access for the first 4 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Oneworld airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly SkyTeam airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly British Airways and Iberia flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with a 45-minute time limit per session.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: A dedicated terminal for private jet travelers, offering exclusive services and amenities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Biggin Hill Airport offers VIP services for private jet owners and their guests.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free for the first 2 hours and then chargeable.
